rating.title: This place is quickly going down hill!!
rating.description: I have lived here for 2 years now and it is quickly changing for the worse. First, there is loud music played outside, kids outside yelling and screaming till late hours, and I have the priviledge of hearing the kids above me being yelled at nightly by their mother while

rating.title: yuk
rating.description: I have been in the apartment for 4 years now.. under the new management, i am ready to move. I have asked if anything can be done to the smoke from my adjoining apartments seeps into my apartment and they tell me to get my vents clean. I am afraid

rating.title: Ready to leave.
rating.description: This place just keeps getting worse and worse. I've posted before, but now I have more issues. I'm tired of the ice cream truck and the shaved ice truck being parked in front of our apartment and never moved. We already don't have enough parking without them using them up.

rating.title: Just moved it...pretty good
rating.description: I've recenting moved into Crest Place. Office staff is very friendly and is willing to answer any questions you have for them. Organization is a little lacking, could be because they are very busy. But still they seem so far to be an excellent group of people.1 big complaint is

rating.title: New Resident;
rating.description: I am a fairly new resident at this property (I've only been here for about 3 months) but I can say that I have had nothing but satisfaction from the management team. When I arrived to move in, the paperwork was quick and easy. My apartment was beautiful and clean

rating.title: New management
rating.description: We've lived here for a couple years nowin the beginning we had no problems, but since the take over (now called Mission Eagle Pointe), we had many problems with the new management. They apparently aren't very well organized; many times my gate remote won't work so I have to wait

rating.title: This place sucks!!
rating.description: My fiancee and I have lived here for almost 3 years and we are ready to move. When we first moved in, things were great, but it was still called Crest Place then and we had the nicest people in the office. They were a part of our family. Now,

rating.title: Excellent, quiet, and safe
rating.description: I have lived here for over 5 months now and I love it. The apts are new and beautiful. The staff at the leasing office and the 2 maintenance men are very friendly and helpful. Every work order I have had was fixed on the same day I requested it

rating.title: Horrible Place To Raise Kids!!!!
rating.description: This community is falling apart and management doesn't care!!!! There is dog fesces all over the grounds, vulgar comments carved in the playground and unmentionable items strewn across the breezeways. Why would someone want to live here with children?? I would not recommend living here.
Crime rates rising within apartment grounds. Informed staff on all 5 occasions that something of mine was vandalized/stolen. Managment did nothing.

rating.title: Yall Suck!
rating.description: Yall Suck nice apartments but they fall apart and no one fixes it

rating.title: sad to go
rating.description: my husband and i moved to crest place in october of 2003 before we got married. we fell in love with the communtity immediately. we have had the wonderful opportunity to meet some great people and make great friends. we even invited the office staff to our wedding. Theresa and

rating.title: Gorgeous apartments, friendly staff, quiet and safe
rating.description: I absolutely love my apartment at Crest Place. The interior is beautiful and it's definitely an efficient use of space. There are big open areas instead of cramped hallways, and two big windows (one in living room, one in bedroom) that let in lots of light. The carpet is good

rating.title: Not worth it
rating.description: I lived here for 1 year and liked them okay at first, but when the complex started filling up, it went downhill. 2 of my neighbors were very shady. The apartments themselves might look okay, but take a look at the grounds when everyone is home and see the kinds

rating.title: Not a tenant, but DEEPLY wish I were!
rating.description: I have visited this property numerous times, looking for a newer and FRIENDLIER place to live. My current lease isn't up until March 2006, but I know, due to the staff (namely Cassie Songer) and the architecture and workmanship (I first viewed them while the 2nd phase was under construction),

rating.title: Very Nice Place to Live
rating.description: I have lived in Crest Place since it's opening. I have never had a problem with the staff or the apartment itself. On the rare occurance that I did have a problem, everything was taken care of very quickly. I rarely visit the office, but they still know me by

rating.title: Never had a problem
rating.description: I don't know what those other people are talking about. The employees there have been as nice to me as the day that I leased and they do neat things like host happy hours, sponsor blood drives and put on breakfasts. I have lived there for almost 2 years and

rating.title: Always a good experince for me...
rating.description: There are always going to a few tenants that aren't happy, but I go the activities that the office has and always have a good time. The girls in the office alwyas know my name and say hi to me when they see me. I really like it here.

rating.title: friendliest office in town? ya right!

rating.title: I have never spit in a resident's face...

rating.title: immature manager
rating.description: Ok, so I cannot believe that the manager of a property would spit in a resident's face!! I can not wait until this lease is up! They are building on a new phase, and the property will be 1/2 ghetto and 1/2 new. But with the way they run things

rating.title: crest place resdent
rating.description: i have lived her since october of 2003, and so glad i chose here. the office staff is always so friendly, and warm welcoming. there is a bit of construction, but it's already looking tons better. i can actually say that my apartment is my home.

rating.title: The best apartments I've lived in since I've moved to Texas
rating.description: I've lived in the Dallas/FortWorth area since 1982 and Crest Place is the best apartments I've lived in.

rating.title: Best Apts Ever!!!!!!!
rating.description: I have lived at Crest Place Apts for approx. 2 years and I couldn´t have found a better place to live. The apt itself is beautiful with 9ft vaulted ceilings, spacious rooms, and garden tubs but it is the people there that make the apt so great. The apt staff

rating.title: I like it here...
